name: Higgs Boson: Challenging Puzzle
description:
Higgs Boson: Challenging Puzzle is a short and challenging experience where the player must rotate pieces considering the move limit to assemble a particle accelerator.
Rotate the pieces to form a geometric shape and make the particles collide with each other;

Featuring:

  • Unique handmade levels that make the player think and act always in an intelligent way;
  • Relaxing soundtrack;
  • Movement limit that makes the game challenging;

Assemble shapes with limited movements


Synchronized rotation
